"Setting Photon Arts?":
"Yo, partner!
Are you setting your Photon Arts?
Even if you've learned a Photon Art, you
won't be able to use it if you don't set it
on your Weapon Palette.
I made that mistake myself, and I ended
up using the same thing over and over.
I'm not saying that happened to you, but
could we go over how to do it anyway,
just as a kind of review?"
"Set a PA on the Weapon Palette."
